issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add castTIME(int32), castTIMESTAMP(int64) and castTIME(utf8) functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12880](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12880). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The task is to add the **castTIME(int32), castTIMESTAMP(** **int64)** and **castTIME(utf8)** functions.

comments.body:
